title: Food Facts: Health (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Health subcategory within Food Facts. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: Recent studies show that eating onions improves blood flow.
cards.romaji: Saikin no kenky. de, tamanegi o taberu to ketsury. ga yokunaru koto ga wakarimashita.
cards.japanese: 最近の研究で、たまねぎを食べると血流がよくなることがわかりました。
